25 #include "blurDetection.h"

27 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>
28 
29 // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7765810/is-there-a-way-to-detect-if-an-image-is-blurry
30 
31 // OpenCV port of 'LAPM' algorithm (Nayar89)
32 double LAPM_Algo(const cv::Mat& src)
33 {
34  cv::Mat M = (cv::Mat_<double>(3, 1) << -1, 2, -1);
35  cv::Mat G = cv::getGaussianKernel(3, -1, CV_64F);
36 
37  cv::Mat Lx;
38  cv::sepFilter2D(src, Lx, CV_64F, M, G);
39 
40  cv::Mat Ly;
41  cv::sepFilter2D(src, Ly, CV_64F, G, M);
42 
43  cv::Mat FM = cv::abs(Lx) + cv::abs(Ly);
44 
45  double focusMeasure = cv::mean(FM).val[0];
46  return focusMeasure;
47 }
48 
49 // OpenCV port of 'LAPV' algorithm (Pech2000)
50 double LAPV_Algo(const cv::Mat& src)
51 {
52  cv::Mat lap;
53  cv::Laplacian(src, lap, CV_64F);
54 
55  cv::Scalar mu, sigma;
56  cv::meanStdDev(lap, mu, sigma);
57 
58  double focusMeasure = sigma.val[0] * sigma.val[0];
59  return focusMeasure;
60 }
61 
62 // OpenCV port of 'TENG' algorithm (Krotkov86)
63 double TENG_Algo(const cv::Mat& src, const int ksize)
64 {
65  cv::Mat Gx, Gy;
66  cv::Sobel(src, Gx, CV_64F, 1, 0, ksize);
67  cv::Sobel(src, Gy, CV_64F, 0, 1, ksize);
68 
69  cv::Mat FM = Gx.mul(Gx) + Gy.mul(Gy);
70 
71  double focusMeasure = cv::mean(FM).val[0];
72  return focusMeasure;
73 }
74 
75 // OpenCV port of 'GLVN' algorithm (Santos97)
76 double GLVN_Algo(const cv::Mat& src)
77 {
78  cv::Scalar mu, sigma;
79  cv::meanStdDev(src, mu, sigma);
80 
81  double focusMeasure = (sigma.val[0] * sigma.val[0]) / mu.val[0];
82  return focusMeasure;
83 }
84 
85 bool prl::isBlurred(const cv::Mat& inputImage)
86 {
87  //TODO: find constants for blurring check for every algorithm. Write supertest, powered by all algorithms
88  return false;
89 }
